meanings.definition: hymenopterans: insects of the order Hymenoptera, including bees, wasps, and ants.
meanings.sent1: Hymenopterans like bees and ants work together in colonies.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hymenopterans buzzing around a flower.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned chaotic when a swarm of hymenopterans decided to join us.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a battlefield as the hymenopterans fought for territory.
meanings.sent5: The tiny hymenopterans carried flower pollen with precision and purpose.
